Document:
# The 10 Spacious Stratagems
[color=#a4885c]0.[/color] [color=#a4885c]The[/color] [color=#ffd700]Golden[/color] [color=#a4885c]Stratagem.[/color] Play your character and don't be an asshole; See Stratagem 4
[color=#a4885c]1.[/color] Users [color=#ff0000]must[/color] Being an annoying asshole that nobody likes leads to death and dishonor.
[color=#a4885c]2.[/color] Honor thy Pharaoh and his retainers.
[color=#a4885c]3.[/color] Sex and ERP are ruinous for the soul and shall be punished accordingly.
[color=#a4885c]4.[/color] Where conscience rules, no laws are needed.
[color=#a4885c]5.[/color] The cat's name is Ramirez.
[color=#a4885c]6.[/color] Seriously, no sexual acts or ERP. You're weird dude.
[color=#a4885c]7.[/color] "self-antagging" (which is a really lame way to describe it but that's against the point) is allowed, but don't do the same thing every single round and try to make it atleast somewhat funny/interesting. Refer to stratagems 0 and 1
[color=#a4885c]8.[/color] Don't leak the wordle answers. I will find you.
[color=#a4885c]9.[/color] Spoiling the wordle answers is really fucking annoying don't do that shit ever
[color=#a4885c]10.[/color] You cannot say "Tim Hortons"
